title: A statistical optimization for almost-complete methylene blue biosorption by Gracilaria bursa-pastoris
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Ali Borham, Mohammed Haroun, Ibrahim A. Saleh, Naser Zomot, Mohammad K. Okla, Mofeed Askar, Mohamad Elmasry, Abdelmonem Elshahat, Lei Liu, Chen Zhao, Juanjuan Wang, Xiaoqing Qian
